item.title: Le Soliel Body
item.description: The revolutioary Le Soleil Body protection uses a specially developed proprietary enwrapping technique to stabilize the organic sunscreens and to ensure high performance with prolonged and consistent SPF values. The aqueous encapsulated Sunscreen is non-irritant, waterproof and not absorbed into the skin, and can also provide a longer skin surface residence time as well as reproducible SPF values with broad spectrum protection (PA++++).
